Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.iteration

Class BaseIterator<Value>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.iteration.BaseIterator<Value>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<Value>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompoundIterator, DeduplicatingIterator, FilteredIterator
public abstract class BaseIterator<Value> extends Object implements Iterator<Value>
An implementation of Iterator that takes care of the basic logic of an iterator. Subclasses only need to implement onNext() by returning the next value, or null if there is not any next value. The sequence of objects returned can be filtered to only those objects matching a Matcher specified by matching(Matcher).

Iteration

  • onNext() - Implemented by the subtype to return the next value, or null if there is none

Filtering

  • matching(Matcher) - Sets a matcher to be used to filter values during iteration
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
